title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 553.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 553.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) All facilities
under the jurisdiction of the Office of Mental Health will be visited and
inspected by reviewers designated by the commissioner in accordance with the
provisions of this Part. Unless otherwise specifically stated in this Part, reviewers shall be personnel of the office who are competent and qualified to
conduct such inspections. (b) This

Part supersedes and replaces Part 71 of this Title with respect to facilities
under the jurisdiction of the Office of Mental Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
553.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
